      static LocalizedText LocalizedText.valueOf(Object object)
      Deprecated. 
      do not use. If the content is not localizable, use new LocalizedText(String). If the content is currently not internationalized, then use LocaleContext.createText(String) so that it can be easily located in the future. For other cases, review your application design.
      Methods in net.proteusframework.core.locale that return types with arguments of type LocalizedText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<LocalizedText,List<Locale>> JDBCLocaleSource.searchTextKeys(List<Object> keys, List<Locale> locales, List<Locale> notLocales, int maxResults)
      Deprecated. 
      to be replaced with more flexible generic search criteria specified in the LocaleSource interface.
      Map<LocalizedText,List<Locale>> JDBCLocaleSource.searchTextValues(String key, List<Locale> locales, List<Locale> notLocales, int maxResults, boolean exact)
      Deprecated. 
      to be replaced with more flexible generic search criteria specified in the LocaleSource interface.
